originalText.text: TNY is home. So grateful for community! My experience has been SO life-changing and wholesome! TNY has a warm atmosphere and originality. Through TNY, God restored my negative outlook on NYC! üôåüèΩ

originalText.text: After the death of my brother in April, I wanted to visit a church near home. I looked at the directory and found this one. Everyone was very  welcoming and friendly. I have a church home but I'm finding this church is a welcoming place to call home also. The atmosphere is electric and bring in the spirit. So good to see young and old worshiping together. I will continue to go.  Thinking about joining Groups once I find out more about them.

text.text: After the death of my brother in April, I wanted to visit a church near home. I looked at the directory and found this one. Everyone was very  welcoming and friendly. I have a church home but I'm finding this church is a welcoming place to call home also. The atmosphere is electric and bring in the spirit. So good to see young and old worshiping together. I will continue to go.  Thinking about joining Groups once I find out more about them.

originalText.text:
The church service was the very first I attended in New York. The auditorium was like a theater room. Everyone in the congregation was mixed from different colors, different race and colors.

The Pastor was dedicating his little Prince on this day. The sermon was inspiring and captivating. The choristers as well were very creative and made me feel at home with the songs presentation and style of their song.

Everyone was really excited and love each others like a family. As a first comer, I received a special welcome from the Pastor and his team who presented us with new Bible and a lovely Card.

Interesting moment after service was the various group platforms where you can take a bite and drinks of various kinds from Men for Christ group, Fashion for Christ, young men Business group, women in Fashion etc. This is just like a family. I got connected, I got motivated and I was celebrated.

originalText.text: The spirit of this church is amazing and off the charts. I just moved to New York and in search of a church so I used Joel Olsteen guide for church‚Äôs in this area and I tried Trinity Harlem Church. The welcome team is great, praise and worship is great, the word is relevant and life changing and I will continue to attend and most likely join. The only reason that I won‚Äôt give 5 stars is the climate level in the church. Although when the word is given I truthfully forget about how warm the building is but the hvac system will certainly need to be addressed. Can‚Äôt wait to serve and join!!

originalText.text: This is a true church, the way a church should be. This place is sure to heal whatever you need healed, and bring you closer to a community of good people. Pastor's word is always so intelligent, uplifting and meaningful! It is just a life changer.
